body_html:
Don't install the '-gcc4.8' versions; they will definitely break on your machine.

I did not realize that NCCL was provided in an anaconda package. Unfortunately, the Caffe2 packages are built assuming NCCL is installed in your system directories (some place like /usr/lib/ or /usr/local/lib/), so for now you will still have to install NCCL from that link above.

body:
Don't install the '-gcc4.8' versions; they will definitely break on your machine.

I did not realize that NCCL was provided in an anaconda package. Unfortunately, the Caffe2 packages are built assuming NCCL is installed in your system directories (some place like /usr/lib/ or /usr/local/lib/), so for now you will still have to install NCCL from that link above.
